Name: Navigate and Purchase an Item from Accessories Category
Description: Navigate to the homepage, access the Accessories category, select a product, add it to the cart, proceed to checkout, and verify the cart page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Click on link 'Accessories' -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 3: Click on link  -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
Step 4: Click on button 'Buy'
Step 5: Click on link 'Place an order' -> Navigate to page 'cart'
Step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
